channel.title: JT Mollner on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in JT Mollner on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Stephen King’s ‘Girl Who Loved Tom Gordon’ Movie in the Works with JT Mollner, Lionsgate (Exclusive)
item.description: Mollner is already in the King business, having written the studio’s upcoming take on the author’s ‘The Long Walk.’
